Articles.Content: So i used to play KSP quite a bit, and dropped out for a while. I noticed a lot of the craft files i had in a repository that has had the URL butchered. Any clue what website that went to?
If you mean the old, old, official one, I think that is gone.
Stick to the current ones. At least one of the old domain names is now a malware source, which is why it's been banned on this forum.
If you're looking for a modern one, kerbalx seems popular.

Quote

www./XXXXX

"Craft repository"...sure....

I'm curious. You did it on purpose?
